boardgame.name: Dale of Merchants
Dale of Merchants Het gilde van de buitengewone handelaren
Dale of Merchants: The Guild of Extraordinary Traders
Dolina Kupców
A Kereskedők Völgye
Tal der Kaufleute: Die Gilde der außergewöhnlichen Händler
O Vale dos Mercadores
El Valle de Los Mercaderes
La Valle dei Mercanti
la Vallée des Marchands: la Guilde des Commerçants Extraordinaires
商人谷
boardgame.description: It is an age of great discoveries. New and wonderful items find their ways into the hands of the greatest merchants. And if there ever is a place those traders love, it is the town of Dale._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;There_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s an extraordinary guild in the Dale founded by the greatest merchants. The tricky part is getting the membership since one must win the annual trading competition to be invited to the guild._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Notable animalfolk merchants from all over the world have gathered in the town to take part in the event. Everyone has only one goal in mind _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; to be celebrated as the winner and the newest member of the legendary guild._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In Dale of Merchants, players take the roles of those participating merchants learning new techniques, trading goods, and managing their stock. The player who first manages to complete their astounding merchant stall wins the game and gets access to the guild!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Dale of Merchants: Systematic Eurasian Beavers
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Episode 16: Clank!, Dale of Merchants, Near and Far, Pandemic: Iberia, Favor of the Pharoah
MN 0149 Small Deck Builders: Valley of the Kings, Dale of Merchants, Xenon Profiteer
What Did You Play This Week Podcast Thing Week 81

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Very good condition, played only once. Shipping is $5.95

New and sealed copy of _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Dale of Merchants_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; (English Kickstarter version). Preferred payment method is bank transfer via IBAN. If you chose PayPal please add +0,50 Euro (EU) or +0,70 Euro (World) to cover their fees or send the money via PayPal _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;send to friend_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;, which is free of charges. Du to its small size I will ship it in an envelope. Shipping costs: Germany: 1,45€ EU/World: 3,70€ If you prefer a boxed package (no tracking number), the costs are: Germany: 3,89€ EU: 8,79€ World: 15,79€

Dale of Merchants is a highly adaptive deck building game with animal-shaped traders competing to enter the prestigious Guild of Extraordinary Traders. The game supports 2–4 players, and playing time is around 20 to 30 minutes. Shipping is 5 euros to the following countries: Australia, Austria, Belgium, Canada, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Gibraltar, Greece, Greenland, Hong Kong, Iceland, Ireland, Israel, Italy, Japan, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Monaco, Netherlands, New Zealand, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Puerto Rico, Romania, San Marino, Singapore, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, Taiwan, United Kingdom and United States Shipping is 20 euros to everywhere else. Shipping time depend on distance from Finland. It varies from 1 day to Finland to couple of weeks to USA.
